mapper.insert: insert into tb_daily_input (date_, utm_source_id, consume, discount, display,exposure, click, comment,downloads) values (#{date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{utmSourceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{consume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discount,jdbcType=REAL}, #{display,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exposure,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{click,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{downloads,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select date_, utm_source_id, consume, discount, display,exposure, click, comment,downloads from tb_daily_input

select date_, utm_source_id, consume, discount, display,exposure, click, comment ,downloads from tb_daily_input order by date_, utm_source_id limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rows,jdbcType=INTEGER}
